Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    ai.rapids.cudf.Aggregate
    please use Aggregation.onColumn instead.
    ai.rapids.cudf.WindowAggregate
    use Aggregation.onColumn.overWindow instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    ai.rapids.cudf.ColumnView.all()
    the only output type supported is BOOL8.
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.count(int)
    please use Aggregation.count.onColumn
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.count(int, boolean)
    please use Aggregation.count.onColumn
    ai.rapids.cudf.WindowAggregate.count(int, WindowOptions)
    please use Aggregation.count().onColumn().overWindow()
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.first(int, boolean)
    please use Aggregation.nth.onColumn
    ai.rapids.cudf.HostColumnVector.ColumnBuilder.incrCurrentIndex()
    ai.rapids.cudf.DType.isTimestamp()
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.last(int, boolean)
    please use Aggregation.nth.onColumn
    ai.rapids.cudf.ColumnView.max(DType)
    the max reduction no longer internally allows for setting the output type, as a work around this API will cast the input type to the output type for you, but this may not work in all cases.
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.max(int)
    please use Aggregation.max.onColumn
    ai.rapids.cudf.WindowAggregate.max(int, WindowOptions)
    please use Aggregation.max().onColumn().overWindow()
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.mean(int)
    please use Aggregation.mean.onColumn
    ai.rapids.cudf.WindowAggregate.mean(int, WindowOptions)
    please use Aggregation.mean().onColumn().overWindow()
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.median(int)
    please use Aggregation.median.onColumn
    ai.rapids.cudf.WindowAggregate.median(int, WindowOptions)
    please use Aggregation.median().onColumn().overWindow()
    ai.rapids.cudf.ColumnView.min(DType)
    the min reduction no longer internally allows for setting the output type, as a work around this API will cast the input type to the output type for you, but this may not work in all cases.
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.min(int)
    please use Aggregation.min.onColumn
    ai.rapids.cudf.WindowAggregate.min(int, WindowOptions)
    please use Aggregation.min().onColumn().overWindow()
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.TableOperation.partition(int)
    Use Table.TableOperation.hashPartition(int)
    ai.rapids.cudf.WindowAggregate.row_number(int, WindowOptions)
    please use Aggregation.rowNumber().onColumn().overWindow()
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.sum(int)
    please use Aggregation.sum.onColumn
    ai.rapids.cudf.WindowAggregate.sum(int, WindowOptions)
    please use Aggregation.sum().onColumn().overWindow()
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.writeORC(File)
    please use writeORCChunked instead
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.writeORC(ORCWriterOptions, File)
    please use writeORCChunked instead
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.writeParquet(File)
    please use writeParquetChunked instead
    ai.rapids.cudf.Table.writeParquet(ParquetWriterOptions, File)
    please use writeParquetChunked instead
